AccountNumber.description: The account number associated with the account.

AccountId.description: The unique identifier of the account.

TimePeriod.description: The time period covered by the report.

Status.description: The status of the ad (active, paused, etc.).

CampaignId.description: The unique identifier of the campaign.

AdGroupName.description: The name of the ad group.

AdGroupId.description: The unique identifier of the ad group.

CurrencyCode.description: The currency code used for monetary values.

AdDistribution.description: Where the ad was displayed (search, content, etc.).

Impressions.description: The total number of impressions received by the ad.

Clicks.description: The total number of clicks on the ad.

Spend.description: The total amount spent on the ad.

AveragePosition.description: The average position of the ad on the search result page.

ConversionRate.description: The conversion rate for the ad.

DeviceType.description: The type of device (desktop, mobile, tablet) on which the ad was displayed.

Language.description: The language targeting for the ad.

ImpressionSharePercent.description: The percentage of impressions achieved by the ad compared to the total available impressions.

ImpressionLostToBudgetPercent.description: The percentage of impressions lost due to budget constraints.

ImpressionLostToRankAggPercent.description: The percentage of impressions lost due to rank aggregation.

QualityScore.description: The quality score of the ad.

ExpectedCtr.description: The expected click-through rate based on targeting settings.

AdRelevance.description: The relevance of the ad to the search query.

LandingPageExperience.description: The quality of the landing page experience.

HistoricalQualityScore.description: The historical quality score of the ad.

HistoricalExpectedCtr.description: The historical expected click-through rate score.

HistoricalLandingPageExperience.description: The historical landing page experience score.

PhoneImpressions.description: The total number of phone impressions.

PhoneCalls.description: The total number of phone calls generated by the ad.

Ptr.description: The phone through rate (PTR) for phone calls.

Network.description: The network where the ad was displayed (search, display, etc.).

Assists.description: The number of assists generated by the ad.

Revenue.description: The total revenue generated by the ad.

ReturnOnAdSpend.description: The return on ad spend for the ad.

RevenuePerConversion.description: The average revenue generated per conversion.

RevenuePerAssist.description: The average revenue generated per assist.

TrackingTemplate.description: The tracking template URL used for campaign tracking.

CustomParameters.description: Custom parameters associated with the ad.

AccountStatus.description: The status of the account (active, paused, etc.).

CampaignStatus.description: The status of the campaign (active, paused, etc.).

AdGroupLabels.description: Labels associated with the ad group.

ExactMatchImpressionSharePercent.description: The percentage of exact match impressions achieved by the ad.

ClickSharePercent.description: The percentage of eligible clicks the ad received out of the total available clicks.

AbsoluteTopImpressionSharePercent.description: The percentage of absolute top impressions achieved by the ad compared to the total available absolute top impressions.

FinalUrlSuffix.description: The final URL suffix added to the displayed URL.

CampaignType.description: The type of campaign (search, shopping, video, etc.).

TopImpressionShareLostToRankPercent.description: The percentage of top impressions lost due to rank constraints.

TopImpressionShareLostToBudgetPercent.description: The percentage of top impressions lost due to budget constraints.

AbsoluteTopImpressionShareLostToRankPerc.description: The percentage of absolute top impressions lost due to rank constraints.

AbsoluteTopImpressionShareLostToBudgetPe.description: The percentage of absolute top impressions lost due to budget constraints.

TopImpressionSharePercent.description: The percentage of top impressions achieved by the ad compared to the total available top impressions.

AbsoluteTopImpressionRatePercent.description: The percentage of absolute top impressions divided by the total impressions in the search result page.

TopImpressionRatePercent.description: The percentage of top impressions divided by the total impressions in the search result page.

AllConversions.description: The total number of all conversions.

AllRevenue.description: The total revenue from all conversions.

AllConversionRate.description: The conversion rate for all conversions.

AllCostPerConversion.description: The cost per conversion for all conversions.

AllReturnOnAdSpend.description: The return on ad spend for all conversions.

AllRevenuePerConversion.description: The average revenue per conversion for all conversions.

ViewThroughConversions.description: The total number of view-through conversions.

AudienceImpressionSharePercent.description: The percentage of audience impressions achieved by the ad compared to the total available audience impressions.

AudienceImpressionLostToRankPercent.description: The percentage of audience impressions lost due to rank constraints.

AudienceImpressionLostToBudgetPercent.description: The percentage of audience impressions lost due to budget constraints.

RelativeCtr.description: The relative click-through rate performance compared to other ads.

AdGroupType.description: The type of ad group (standard, dynamic, remarketing, etc.).

ConversionsQualified.description: The total number of qualified conversions.

AllConversionsQualified.description: The total number of qualified conversions.

ViewThroughConversionsQualified.description: The total number of qualified view-through conversions.

ViewThroughRevenue.description: The revenue generated from view-through conversions.

VideoViews.description: The total number of video views.

ViewThroughRate.description: The percentage of view-through conversions out of total viewable impressions.

AverageCPV.description: The average cost-per-view for video ads.

VideoViewsAt25Percent.description: The total number of video views at 25% completion.

VideoViewsAt50Percent.description: The total number of video views at 50% completion.

VideoViewsAt75Percent.description: The total number of video views at 75% completion.

CompletedVideoViews.description: The total number of completed video views for video ads.

VideoCompletionRate.description: The percentage of video views that were completed.

TotalWatchTimeInMS.description: The total watch time in milliseconds for video ads.

AverageWatchTimePerVideoView.description: The average watch time per video view for video ads.

AverageWatchTimePerImpression.description: The average watch time per impression for video ads.

Sales.description: The total number of sales generated by the ad.

RevenuePerSale.description: The average revenue generated per sale.

Installs.description: The total number of app installs.

RevenuePerInstall.description: The average revenue generated per app install.
